thread.title: THIS is how you do hospitality!
thread.title_full: THIS is how you do hospitality! - Review of Avalon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: fanderson711
title: THIS is how you do hospitality!
text: I can't say enough good things about this hotel and their staff! The location is central to everything, scores of good restaurants in any direction for any tast (no pun intended). Everything about this property is just lovely, and I won't being staying anywhere else when I'm in NYC.
